snippet: AMES--Steven. The Board of Governors and members of Beach Point Club note with deep sorrow the passing of our fellow member, Steven Ames, and extend sincere condolences to his family. James Dreyfus, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: AMES--Steven. The Board of Governors and members of Beach Point Club note with deep sorrow the passing of our fellow member, Steven Ames, and extend sincere condolences to his family. James Dreyfus, President 1/3
